attributes.action: Close the tax loophole which allows so called non domiciles, to avoid tax  on their earnings, by claiming another country as their home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mega wealthy ,non domiciles are living in the UK ,but paying lower taxes than those British residents,who pay through the PAYE system.This means that the labourer,the nurse,the teacher,are paying substantially more tax as a proportion of their income,than non domiciled billionaires.
Any decent and fair society,is based on tax contributions dependant on means.The burden under this government falls disproportionartely on the lower and middle earners.Some cleaners pay more tax, than non dom billionaires.The latter must make a  fair contribution to our public services.
